home.name: Laís Sanseverino
home.intro: Hello! My name is Laís Sanseverino - a designer and biologist, fascinated by the relationships between health, education, and informational design.

ProfileInfo.vision: My vision is marked by interdisciplinarity and driven by constant learning, as is evident in my various degrees and work experiences.
ProfileInfo.informationToVisual: I say that I enjoy taking information - redundant, verbose, and difficult - and transforming it into concise visual communication that appeals to the target audience, always based on informational and user-centered design.
ProfileInfo.work: In addition to freelancing, I work as an Instructional Designer at the Distance Education Center of the State University of Londrina, and I was the Clinical Research Coordinator at São Francisco Medical Center.
ProfileInfo.leisure: In my leisure time, I enjoy going to the gym and expressing myself artistically through fashion, crafts, and illustration.

graphicDesign.specializationsBio: Specialist in Biology and Wildlife Conservation

instructionalDesign.specializationDesign2: Planning and Creation of Educational Materials
instructionalDesign.specializationDesign3: Guides, Manuals, and Static and Interactive Infographics
